name: Speedy Miner
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 45 Compo in 48 hours.  Theme: Start with nothing

Your goal is to reach the bottom. You only have 5 minutes to do it. You start at a height of 200 and you have to break materials in front of you. Each material has a chance of giving a scrap, which can be used  to craft items to make yourself faster.

Some helpful buttons:
Ctrl + M to mute music.
Esc to return to menu
